name: Power Strip, SUPERDANNY Surge Protector with 22 AC Outlets and 6 USB Charging Ports, 1875W/15A, 2100 Joules, 6.5Ft Flat Plug Heavy Duty Extension Cord for Home, Office, Dorm, Gaming Room, Black
short_description: 【28-in-1 Versatile Power Strip】 FCC, RoHS safety certified, with the extension cord and flat plug certified by UL. Superdanny power strip surge protector has 22 grounded 3-prong outlets and 6 USB ports, providing power for all devices that you need to plug in at one location. Perfect for gaming or media set up, surround sound system, TV, phone, tablet, PC, laptop, gaming computers, lamps, and other devices simultaneously.

【Widely Spaced Outlets】 The unique design of this USB power strip prevents bulkier plugs from blocking other outlets, as the outlets are spaced enough. There are four rows of outlets that give you multiple ways of plugging in a variety of cords. The power strip helps organize your cords, accommodate your numerous adapters, save space with much less clutter. Note: The side outlets cannot be rotated.

【Smart USB Fast Charging】 Not need to find adapters or plugs for your USB devices. This power strip flat plug is a nice upgrade since there are 5 UBS-A & 1 USB-C charging ports. The built-in smart charging technology allows USB C chargers to detect your devices automatically and deliver the fastest possible charge up to 5V/3A.

【Mountable and Flat Plug】 There are 4 keyholes on the back, so you can mount this flat extension cord onto the wall or furniture easily, 4 screws and 1 marking sheet included. The 45°angled flat plug fits perfectly in narrow spaces like behind a bookshelf, nightstand, or the TV, and does not cover the bottom receptacle of a duplex outlet. The 6.5 ft heavy duty extension cord delivers power (1875W/15A) where it is needed.

【Multi Safety Protection】SUPERDANNY offers FREE replacement for this power strip surge protector of unacceptable quality within 1000 days. Backed with 8-fold safety protection: fire-retardant casing, 2100J surge protection, overload protection, grounded protection, short-circuit protection, over-current protection, over-voltage protection, and overheat protection.

name: 8 Outlet Long Power Strip, 2100J Surge Protector Heavy Duty 6FT Cord Wide Spaced and Wall Mount Metal Powerstrip for Home Office Garage Workshop
short_description: ✅Premium Safety Features: Protect your desk power strip with 2100 Joule surge protection and a built-in auto shutdown fuse. Reliable safety protection switch will automatically trip off in case of over-voltage, over-current, overload, high temperature and short circuit to protect your equipment.
✅Mountable Power Strip: The power strip has 4 mounting holes on the back and the package contains 4 mounting screws for horizontal and vertical installation on the wall or under the table.

✅8 Outlet Wide Spaced Power Strip: Equipped with 8 sockets and 1.69” wide spacing, perfect for bulky chargers and different sized plugs. 6ft long cord length allows you to easily adjust the length of the cable with ease.

✅Heavy Duty Power Strip: Sturdy construction with thick aluminum metal housing, High-density PVC power cord features a durable wire, 100% copper 3-prong wire has more stable conductivity and less heating.

✅Flat Plug Power Strip: The 45°flat plug will not block the bottom socket of your duplex wall outlet and takes up less space for space saving. Ideal for office, home, school, commercial, shop, industrial, workshop, garage, bedroom, workbench, laboratory, factory, kitchen, under cabinet and etc.

✅Maximum load 15A / 125V / 1875W / 60Hz. An automatic shut-off fuse is fitted inside for extra safety during use. If the current exceeds 15A, the power strip will be shut down immediately to protect the electronic devices. And the fuse is disposable, so the product will not be able to continue to use after exceeding the specified power.

name: Tripp Lite ISOBAR6ULTRA Isobar 6 Outlet Heavy Duty Power Strip Surge Protector, 3330 Joules, 6ft Cord, Flat Plug, Metal Power Strip, Industrial Garage Work Shop Bench, Under Desk and Wall Mountable
short_description: HEAVY-DUTY SURGE PROTECTOR POWER STRIP: Features 6-outlets, a robust 3330-joule rating, and a sturdy all-metal housing. Ensure comprehensive protection for your valuable electronics, including A/V, network, garage, and industrial equipment

POWER CONDITIONING: Patented design features 3 exclusive isolated filter banks that limit noise interaction among connected devices. Also blocks EMI/RFI line noise up to 80 dB, ensuring optimal performance of amplifiers and audio/video equipment

PREMIUM SAFETY FEATURES: Conforms to UL 1449 3rd Edition safety standards and exceeds IEEE 587 Category A and B surge suppression specifications. Includes a 12A circuit breaker with automatic shutoff if the protection circuit is incapacitated

VERSATILE INSTALLATION: The surge protector has a 6 ft. AC power cord and keyhole slots on the bottom panel for convenient wall or desk mounting options. Space-saving right-angle plug allows furniture and equipment to move flush against the wall

FULLY BACKED AND SUPPORTED: This product is protected by a Lifetime Limited Manufacturer's Warranty and $50,000 Ultimate Connected Equipment insurance. This device is also supported by Eaton's expert technical support team over phone, web and email
product_description: Premium Series Isobar Surge Protectors: The Gold Standard of Power Protection Join over 20 million customers who trust Isobar surge suppressors to protect their electronics from surges and line noise. With high-quality components, a durable metal case, and a unique noise filtration system, Isobar offers top-tier protection. Network-Grade 3330-Joule Surge Protection Ideal for A/V components, network hardware, and more, this surge protector safeguards against surges and spikes. It meets IEEE 587 Category A and B specs and features full normal and common mode surge suppression. Isolated Filter Banks Three isolated filter banks limit noise interference among connected equipment, blocking up to 80 dB of EMI/RFI line noise. This ensures optimal performance for sensitive electronics. 6-Outlets for Various Devices Six widely spaced NEMA 5-15R AC outlets accommodate bulky transformers. Safety covers prevent accidental contact with unused outlets. Premium Safety Features Automatic shutoff cuts power if the protection circuit fails. A lighted switch and 12A circuit breaker provide control and protection, while diagnostic LEDs indicate power, protection, and line fault status. Easy Integration A 6 ft. AC power cord and right-angle plug fit into tight spaces. Keyhole slots offer convenient mounting options, and the metal housing ensures durability.
